channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
I was changing bonuses in item.cfg now I got this error after running my server.
[code]Enforcing Bluescap3 client requirement Bluecap3 Server. Connection from ip00-00-00-00.ph.ph.cox.net:2134 Connection from c-00-00-00-00.hsd1.fl.comcast.net:49288 [client-1-L e g e n d]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 0 ms] [client-2-Itza rap]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 0 ms] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:273) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:232) at server.main(server.java:118) [/code]

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Lower The Bonus’s Or Leave Three 0’s At The End, Thats What Helped Me

Read full topic
